verses.verse: <S%G4826>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to them that have <S%G2975>obtained<s%> like <S%G2472>precious<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> with <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

<S%G5485>Grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>,

According <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2304>divine<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> has <S%G1433>given<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> pertain <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of him that has <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1223>to<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G703>virtue<s%>:

<S%G1223>By<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are <S%G1433>given<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> exceedingly <S%G3176>great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G1862>promises<s%>: <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> you might <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G2844>partakers<s%> of <S%G5449>the<s%> <S%G2304>divine<s%> <S%G5449>nature<s%>, having <S%G668>escaped<s%> the <S%G5356>corruption<s%> that is <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G1939>lust<s%>.

<S%G2532%G99999>And<s%> <S%G846>because<s%> of <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G3923>giving<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%>, <S%G2023>add<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G703>virtue<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G703>virtue<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>;

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G1466>self-control<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G1466>self-control<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%>;
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%> brotherly <S%G5360>kindness<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> brotherly <S%G5360>kindness<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5225>if<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G5225>are<s%> in <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4121>abound<s%>, they <S%G2525>make<s%> you that you shall <S%G3756>neither<s%> be <S%G692>childless<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G175>unfruitful<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1063>But<s%> he <S%G3739%G99999>that<s%> <S%G3918>lacks<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%>, and cannot see afar <S%G3467>off<s%>, and <S%G2983>has<s%> <S%G3024>forgotten<s%> that he was <S%G2512>purged<s%> <S%G266>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3819>old<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%>, give <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G4704>diligence<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2821>calling<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1589>election<s%> <S%G949>sure<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> if you <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, you <S%G4218%G99999>shall<s%> <S%G3364%G99999>never<s%> <S%G4417>fall<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> an <S%G1529>entrance<s%> shall be <S%G2023>served<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4146>abundantly<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> I <S%G272>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G272>negligent<s%> to <S%G5279>put<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G104>always<s%> in <S%G5279>memory<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%>, <S%G2539>though<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2532>them<s%>, and are <S%G4741>established<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3918>present<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%>.

<S%G1161>Yes<s%>, I think <S%G2233>it<s%> <S%G1909>suitable<s%>, as long <S%G3745>as<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G4638>tabernacle<s%>, to <S%G1326>stir<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1326>up<s%> by <S%G5280>putting<s%> you <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5280>memory<s%>;

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5031>shortly<s%> I must put <S%G595>off<s%> this <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4638>tabernacle<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G1213>shown<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%>.

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> I will endeavor <S%G4704>that<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> may be <S%G4160>able<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G1841>departure<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%> <S%G1539>always<s%> in <S%G3420>memory<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G1811>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1811>followed<s%> cunningly <S%G4679>devised<s%> <S%G3454>fables<s%>, when we made <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G2030>eyewitnesses<s%> <S%G3168>of<s%> <S%G1565>his<s%> <S%G3168>majesty<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, when there <S%G5342>came<s%> <S%G5107>such<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5259>from<s%> <S%G1391>the<s%> <S%G3169>excellent<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am well <S%G2106>pleased<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> which <S%G5342>came<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%>, when we <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3735>the<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%>.

We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a more <S%G949>sure<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G4397>prophecy<s%>; to <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> that you take <S%G4337>care<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> to a <S%G3088>light<s%> that <S%G5316>shines<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G850>dark<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>, <S%G2193%G99999>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1306>dawns<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the day <S%G5459>star<s%> <S%G393>arise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>:

<S%G1097>Knowing<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G1955>of<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G2398>private<s%> <S%G1955>interpretation<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> <S%G5342>came<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in old <S%G4218>time<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> as they were <S%G5342>moved<s%> by <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.
